name: Game Title Alpha
description:
GAME TITLE

A text-based RPG where you kill things to get gold to buy things to make killing things more easier and as this process continues you gain experience and level up getting better stats and spells to make it even easier to kill things and then you can complete quests by killing things and get better things to kill things from these quests then you can unlock more areas after defeating bosses until you eventually beat the game by beating the final boss making this game completely original and having no association, inspiration, or similarities with any other RPG because it is just so unique.

(the screenshots were taken in the terminal windows app so the background color matches the page)
